TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ConfigurationSectionCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class ConfigurationSectionCollection Inherits NameObjectCollectionBase

summary.span: 表示配置文件中相关章节的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of related sections within a configuration file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用类以循环访问集合的对象。Use the class to iterate through a collection of objects. 你可以访问的对象使用此集合属性或属性。You can access this collection of objects using the property or the property. 类还可创建扩展的自定义类型类。The class is also used in the creation of custom types that extend the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example shows how to use the class.
